edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.inventory

Class BookDBTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_library.inventory.BookDBTest

  • public class BookDBTest
extends java.lang.Object
    The book DB test runs tests on the book DB test to ensure it properly creates the book object. The methods also tests the exceptions.
    Author:
    Marcus

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        The set up method instantiates the classes needed for the tests.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testBookDB

        public void testBookDB()
        Test method for BookDB.BookDB(java.lang.String) . The test book method ensures the constructor creates a file properly. It also checks the exceptions, which should be thrown if the book database tries to read from a corrupt or nonexistent file.

      • testTraverse

        public void testTraverse()
        Test method for BookDB.traverse(). The test traverse method shows the books in proper (alphabetical) order. If the books are not in order, there are problems.

      • testFindItemAt

        public void testFindItemAt()
        Test method for BookDB.findItemAt(int). The find item at method checks the exceptions at the boundaries. It should throw an exception for less than 0 or for more books than are in the list.
